Execution of the `net use` command with.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for processes executing 'net.exe' with command-line arguments containing 'use' and '/delete'. Analyze the parent process and user account associated with the command execution. Use frequency analysis on command arguments to identify rare or unusual usages.

Abnormal termination of network share se.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 5140 for network share access events. Look for abrupt cessation of expected share activity. Analyze Zeek conn.log (port 445) for session termination events that lack corresponding 'net use /delete' commands from the source host. Correlate share access patterns using time series analysis to identify unusual termination timings or volumes.
